sentences.english: Is this the right bus to Zizhuyuan Park?

sentences.english: The girl was named Susan. They went to the same workplace when jack was in another city.
sentences.chinese: 那个女孩叫紫竹，在武汉，他们在同一所大厦上班。

sentences.english: Purple flowers are beautiful, but, open time is very short, only two days.
sentences.chinese: 紫竹花很漂亮，但是，开得时间很短，只有两天。

sentences.english: The bedroom space in the design Zizhu Garden, I thought of this issue.
sentences.chinese: 在设计紫竹花园时，我就想到了这个问题。
